title: Hopefully within the next year or so, rito will release a spanish champion with stealth or something
body:
[](https://data2.origin.com/content/dam/originx/web/app/games/aragami/aragami/aragami-standard-edition_pdp_3840x2160_en_WW.jpg)
Because
https://i.imgur.com/kQbHvYJ.gif[/img]

Edit: All I wanted to do was play a champion that deletes a person and have them go "wtf" to which I respond with "NOBODY EXPECTS THE SPANISH INQUISITION!" (and it would make sense because the champion is Spanish)

replies.body: But Spain doesn't exist in Runeterra...
Neither does France but Fiora has the accent.

yes please copy blizzard some more

https://d1u1mce87gyfbn.cloudfront.net/media/screenshot/sombra-screenshot-006-6de9884047e0fa523c234ce979e9418a573ea758ab7166d58c90e6118a3a849b6dab2a0ead43a7b4720e657c502e1fe94fc1913ff5a2be7df0b01d8b36ec9c3b.jpg

To be fair our design team has never been very creative on their own. (not bm'ing them mods!)

I mean pretty much our entire roster is a ripoff or clone in some way or another.

Monty python wouldn't be the worst creative source. Can we get some comedy related designs?

reported. banned.

i mean to be completely honest there's only so much you can do with *abilities*. but the lore is fairly unique, or as much so as can be expected.

Hey, your image wasn't posted correctly, so I went ahead and fixed it. Your url was a link to the imgur page hosting the image, not to the image itself. To get the image's url just from that page right click the image and press "copy image address" (wording varies by browser). And since it is imgur, don't forget to add [/img] the to end to center it correctly.

For more help, please check out the following guide: [Posting Images and Gifs on the Boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/esjzN2Q1-posting-images-and-gifs-on-the-boards)
Just do full damage Shen and call it the Shenish Inquisition.
Just give Vayne an inquisitor skin.
i dont think theres a mexico in rune terra
Is there a Spain in Runeterra? You can want a champion with a certain skin tone or gender but not one from a nation from the real world. The best sand people you're gonna get is Taliyah
I think the Damacian Inquisition has a nice ring to it.
Sand people, what... Why Spain = Sand people?
